activities: INTTRA receives user data from 4 commercial web sites:  www.oceanschedules.com, www.cvt.inttra.com, www.oceanmetrics.com, and www.inttraworks.inttra.com from users who wish to access INTTRA Services on behalf of the company they represent.  INTTRA also received personal data from INTTRA employees working in Europe.
